name: Minotaur's Cave Pursuit
description:
Explore the cave to catch the dwarf but beware of the traps and ennemies if you want to reach him alive.

A 2d platformer made for a first year school project and first game development experience on unity

Controls :

Left and right arrows to move

Up arrow to jump (wall jump too)

Right click to attack

"Esc" to open pause menu
